abstract: Terekeka Journal; South Sudan state of Terekeka has been thrown into upheaval by Pres Salva Kiir's announcement that he will split country into 28 states rather than former 10 and questions over whether Terekeka is county or state; decree, Kiir's addition to peace deal with rebels, has led to territorial squabbles and accusations of Kiir favoring his own Dinka ethnic group.

headline.print_headline: Dispute Over Area’s Status Heightens Suffering in South Sudan
headline.main: Dispute Over Area’s Status Heightens Suffering in South Sudan

snippet: A fragile peace deal could bring traders back to Terekeka after South Sudan’s civil war. But first, the formerly warring parties must agree on what Terekeka is: a county or a state.
lead_paragraph: A fragile peace deal could bring traders back to Terekeka after South Sudan’s civil war. But first, the formerly warring parties must agree on what Terekeka is: a county or a state.
